input.sentences: the filming had n't begun yet but [male] was feeling uneasy .

output.sentences: The people were ready to begin filming and were cold and had to wait outside.
The lighting crew sat up the cameras while the people waited.
The lighting crew came over to make sure the actors were ready.
The directors got ready for the filming to start.
